data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Bouches-du-Rhône, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bouches-du-Rhône, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Bouches-du-Rhône, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Bouches-du-Rhône, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, encourage the church of Bouches-du-Rhône, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Bouches-du-Rhône, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Moroccan, Arabic-speaking people might believe through him.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Bouches-du-Rhône, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,970,586 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Bouches-du-Rhône to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Bouches-du-Rhône, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
